summary: Prompt library enhancement: add 20 high-quality AI prompts across video, photo, ads, and social media categories; persist them and display them in the prompt library.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 20 high-quality AI prompts across video, photo, ads, and social media categories; save and display them in the prompt library

Create 20 new high-quality AI prompt records (English) distributed across the existing backend categories: videoGeneration, photoGeneration, cgiAds, and socialMedia. Each prompt record must include: title, description, fullText, tags[], and boolean flags isPopular, isNew, isPremium.

Persist the 20 new prompts in the canister so they are returned by getAllPrompts and therefore appear in the Prompt Library. The seeding must be idempotent (running it multiple times must not create duplicates) and must not break existing prompt IDs or existing stored prompts.

projectName: Seed and display 20 new AI prompts in the Prompt Library (Video, Photo, Ads, Social Media)
